title: Ashlee Simpson sports pink hair as she and Evan Ross enjoy Sunday outing with daughter Jagger, 4
text:
They are doting parents to four-year-old daughter Jagger.

And on Sunday, Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross took the tot to a farm stand and pumpkin patch in LA.

Ashlee, 35, carried the excited youngster in one arm as she and Evan, 31, held hands.

Family: They are doting parents to four-year-old daughter Jagger. And on Sunday, Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross took the tot to a farm stand and pumpkin patch in LA

Ashlee's long hair was dyed pink and she sported round sunglasses.

For the outing, she wore a sage green plaid blazer and dark green corduroy pants and stepped out in white sneakers.

Jagger was dressed in a pink sleeveless frock and pink checkerboard slip-on Vans.

Stylish mom: Ashlee, who sported dyed pink hair and wore a green ensemble of plaid blazer and corduroy pants, carried her excited daughter in one arm as she and Evan held hands

Evan also wore plaid - pairing a dark-colored baggy shirt over cropped baggy brown pants.

He had on a knitted hat and sore black socks and trainers.

He accessorized with several necklaces.

The couple married in 2014 in a ceremony held at the Connecticut estate of Evan's mother Diana Ross.

Ashlee is also mom to son Bronx, 10, whom she shares with her ex-husband Pete Wentz.
description: Ashlee, 35, carried the excited youngster in one arm as she and Evan, 31, held hands.
